content.detailedDescription:
This was last night (9-18-14), about 9pm over the stratosphere/north las vegas.  i actually think this was further north than north las vegas but distance at night is just a guess. the lights actually had a slight amber tint to them and you can see the passing aircraft.   so we wondered if any aircraft saw the same lights.  the lights were stationary in the sky.  

i set my camera to the wrong setting so the quality is less that i expected. also, i took this video 'over' the initial recording (i thought i was recording to tape but instead selected to record to memory.)   so when i started recording the 2nd sighting, i recorded over the 1st sighting, so i only have about half the video i initially took.

the 1st sighting was in the northwest (towards red rocks), & the lights appeared at approximately the same altitude as the 2nd recording/sighting, attached.   in the 1st recording there were only 3 lights. they slowly disappeared one at a time.  then in less than 30 seconds they reappeared in the north.  


1.  we were in our backyard, that over looks the strip & mountains.   we always look at the strip which is approximately 12 miles from our home.  
2. in the nnw there is not normally any approaching aircraft landing lights.   this  would be an odd approach for landing aircraft.  both my wife & i use to work for the airlines at mccarran. 

after they disappeared in the nnw, we started to go into the house but then the 3 lights reappeared in the n. they were joined by 3 more lights that appeared one at a time.  slowly they all disappeared 1 at a time while i was on the phone with 311. 
3.  unknown at first, but after observing for several minutes & the lights remained stationary we felt this was not right.  we called 311 to find out if there had been other reports, but was told none had been received.   also the lights were a strange bright amber color & the aircraft & helicopter appear white in the night sky.  
4. the objects appeared round, star like, twinkling almost, but the twinkling could have been from the atmosphere due to the distance.  they were amber in color.  they never moved just appeared & then disappeared.  
5. amazement & curiosity.  very interesting & a feeling we were witnessing ufos.  as stated above, we called 311 to find out if others had seen the same lights.
6. they disappeared one at a time.
content.summary: 3 lights hanging, then 6' then all disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
Scattered ufos. have 20 or so photos. one photo with up to 10 ufos in formation. from google street. 
google street. noticed objects everywhere over about 70 yards of
google car moving forward. spent time moving forward and panning the sky and kept finding more objects. very strange.
content.summary: Scattered ufos. have 20 or so photos. one photo with up to 10 ufos in formation. from google street.

content.detailedDescription: There were about 5 of us outside talking , from the corner of our eyes the sky appeared with  8 objects that looked like stars. the sun was barley going down so it couldn't be stars. and if it was an airplane it would have blinking lights on them. these objects were bunched up and one of them happened to take off really fast. as i looked through the binoculars the objects were beaming with light that turned reddish orange.
content.summary: 8 still like objects in the sky

content.detailedDescription: At 7pm i was visiting with family when suddenly my mother noticed 8 what looked like white balls floating perfectly still. the sun was setting and the objects were in yellowish sunset, on the western horizon. i immediate began to take pictures and film the objects. there were a total of 5 of us who saw these objects.
content.summary: 8 still white/reflective objects, eventually turned red then gradually faded away.

content.detailedDescription: I live out in the country and stepped outside to smoke around 7:45 p.M. as i was outside smoking i was facing south and was looking at the sky when i noticed a bright starlike light almost directly overhead.  the sky was still blue but the sun was setting on the horizon. the sky was slightly hazy but clear where i was looking.  i wondered if it was an aircraft with its landing lights on.  i walked over to a pole in my yard and watched it  while sighting it above the pole to check for movement.  i watched for 3 or 4 minutes but it wasn't moving.    there were no other stars out yet just this bright unmoving light that i didn't recognize.  i went in an grabbed my binoculars and looked at the light while laying on my porch.  the light didn't flash or pulsate it was white and bright.  i thought it must be a weather balloon reflecting light off the setting sun.  it had a strange shape in the binoculars reminded me of a shuttlecock laying on its side.  i then went inside my house to get my ipad to take a picture of it.  when i got outside it was gone.  i was only in the house about 15 seconds.  i scanned the sky for the next 10 minutes and noticed a starlike light  almost directly overhead moving south it brightened and dimmed into nothingness within 5 seconds like an iridium flare, it was close to where the stationary bright light was earlier.  it seemed strange to me since i have some knowledge of astronomy and have years of experience stargazing and watching the sky.  it wasn't a chinese lantern as i have lighted some over the 4 th of july and watched them fly off into the distance.
content.summary: Bright light overhead not moving

content.detailedDescription: A friend of mine was flying on a commercial airliner from new york to california when he saw another airplane that appeared to be leaving a con-trail or a chem-trail.  he knows that i am interested in chem-trails so he decided to take a few pictures of the plane to send to me.  after looking at the pictures i noticed that there was something else in the picture that did not seem like it should be there.  the image quality is pretty high, it was taken with an iphone camera.  when i zoomed in on the object it appeared to have structure.  i tried to rule out things like it being dirt on the outside window, but he took a total of 3 pictures out the same window and this object is only visible in two of them, which would lead me to believe it was not some sort of smudge or something like that.  i think he might have accidentally captured a craft of some kind, that might have actually been following the plane that was leaving the trails.  i have attached the pictures for your review.  in the second picture not only is there this other object, but off to the right of it there is a whiteish something that is not in the prior picture.  my friend said that it was about a minute or two between the first and second pictures.  not sure how much time was between the second and third picture.  i would like to know what you think this is.
content.summary: Something odd captured on two picturs taken from airplane

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i were returning home from a supper outing. the time was approximately 8:10 pm. on friday september 12, 2014. as we neared the turn to our house, we noticed three bright red lights in the northeast sky well above the treeline. they weren't blinking but just a bright steady red. it appeared they were moving slowly. one minute later we had parked in the driveway. i went into the street to see if i could get a better view. there are a lot of large trees and leaves that made it hard to see. as i looked up, i saw a perfectly round shaped disc clearing the trees right above my head but a little north of my position. it was quite high. it was hard to estimate the size but i assume it was quite large. i called to my girlfriend who joined me and was amazed at the craft. it appeared to be a mottled colour of tan and pinkish and light grey. it definitely wasn't silver. the color seemed very uneven almost pulsating but not bright. rather dullish. there were clouds in the sky but we saw this against the late blue of the sky. it was almost directly above our heads. it seemed to cruise slowly in a southwest direction until in vanished into some clouds. that is where we lost sight of it. although quite high (i have to assume) it still looked about the size of nickel if i made a circle with my forefinger and thumb and made no sound as it slowly flew by. as we looked over the house, in a southerly direction, we noticed two red glowing objects cruising in the same direction. they appeared to be two separate lights because they were quite a distance apart. one seemed much higher. i live near a small airport and have seen planes in the sky before but i have to say that these lights were different. they weren't blinking. just a bright steady red cruising through the sky slowly. they too disappeared past our limit of vision. i went to the backyard to see if i could see them as my girlfriend went for a camera but they were no longer visible. this is the first time in my life or ours that we have witnessed something so unusual. we initially saw three bright red lights and when i went into the street a minute or so later is when i noticed the disc object overhead and only saw the two red lights a couple of minutes later. they all seemed to be going in the same direction but i would say miles apart. i have done a fair amount of research on the internet regarding this subject and was quite elated that this has happened to me. my girlfriend on the other hand remarked that it made her feel very unsettled or uneasy about the sighting. sincerely this event happened just as i have described it.
content.summary: Observed three bright red lights and a disc shaped craft

content.detailedDescription: Opening day of teal season 2014 in iowa.Had two friends with me. one to my right noticed the light first in the northwest sky. it was brighter than all the other stars and was not flashing at all. the object moved on a steady path from northwest to southeast for approximately 15 minutes until disappearing out of sight. my father was in aviation during vietnam and taught me the difference between planes and other aircraft at night and during the day. there were planes flying from two different directions during this same time and the object in question was definitely out of our atmosphere.This was not any recognizable aircraft to me and didn't appear to me to be a satellite either.
content.summary: White orb moving from north west to south east at steady speed. brighter than all stars

content.detailedDescription: I went to bed at 11 pm & woke up at 1 am to let my dog out. i was at the door no more than 10 seconds when the craft appeared from the left. it was barely above the treetops and no more than 40 feet away from the end of my street. it was a two level craft with red and white pulsating lights several feet high separating the two levels. it made no noise and there was no vapor or trail. the craft was very large, about 100 feet from one side to the other.I heard laughter coming from the trees that sound childish, but no one was out at that time. the craft turned to the right, remaining slow and steady and disappeared out of sight within 2 minutes.  i went back to bed. the next day i saw neighbors closest to the craft in their yard. i went up to them and all i said was, "by any chance was anyone outside at 1 am this morning?" they said no and i said, " oh,  i was just wondering if perhaps someone might have saw something unusual last night" and they said, "oh, you mean the ufo's. they fly over all the time". that was the end of the event.
content.summary: 2 level , very clear large craft with pulsating lights several feet high. very close & very easy to see.

content.detailedDescription: Every night i have 4 cameras set up outside for sky watching. all data is analyzed the following day after all the footage of the cameras are recorded using a security dvr. on the evening of september 16th at approx. 9:08 pm est, a round circular object was seen on camera 4 moving from the east to west directly overhead...This lasted approximately 11 seconds. the object was near or at cloud level, left no visible trail and had no navigation lights. the object was quite large and when it passed through or close to clouds, it created a round tight ring around it. it seemed to be rotating due to the tight ring of clouds that surrounded it. it also seemed to be emitting some type of energy or particles as it traveled to the west. it made no sound and camera lost object after it moved out of view.
content.summary: Object detected on my skycam equipment

content.detailedDescription:
I would like what it is as this is the first time that i have seen such lights.

i had just finished dinner and came to the front car porch to check the dogs.
it was drizzling outside with some few clouds.

suddenly i notice some strange lights. as this part of the country is tropic and since auroras are not visible in this place, i was suprised to see these lights. also there was no aircraft nor was there any flight path in this area. i took my iphone and caught in video  when it again suddenly appeared the second time.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Circular obs.. sometimes made a  s sign quickly

content.detailedDescription: I was driving south on coors blvd near paseo del norte.  i saw two bright white lights flying in unison while making loops and spirals in the sky. they were in perfect unison the entire time and performed maneuvers that are impossible in any type of known aircraft.  after about ten seconds of this,  both lights changed from white to red and blue flashing lights. at this point both objects were heading west and i watched them until i couldn't see them anymore.
content.summary: Two bright white objects in unison making loops in the sky,  then they shape shifted and had red and blue flashing lights.

content.detailedDescription: Walked across the street to talk to some neighbors, while talking i happen to look up at this tree and see a bright round looking light out of nowhere, as soon as i seen it, it shot off in a straight path over the top of the neighbors house. i started yelling "did you see that!!! did you that!!!" running to the street to see if i could still see it, but it was gone..Within 10 seconds. it looked as if it was maybe 2ft above her house. they didn't see a thing, that's how fast it happened. first thought it was a shooting star, but i have never ever seen a shooting star that hovered at the tree top then shot off over the top of a house. scared the hell out of me!
content.summary: Talking to neighbors looked up at the tree, bright circle light right below tree top, took off in straight line over house and disappered.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my wife were travelling somewhere on uk then noticed dark shaded ufo that is changing its speed rapidly and can handle sudden maneuvers in extra ordinary speed limits on the clouds. we were above the clouds and there is no any human made object around there even none of human made objects could handle such as this maneuvers in accordance to well known physics rules. my spouse could recorded a short period of video film.
content.summary: We were travelling in an airplane somewhere on uk then suddenly noticed an ufo from window.

content.detailedDescription:
I went down to talk to terri about starting work tomorrow.  we were discussing this when i looked up and noticed something moving in the sky.  at first i thought it was a satellite,  then i noticed irregular movement as well as stopping, flashing a light at me and then continuing on it's flight path north.

it was not satellite.  i spotted 9 ufo's in the time span of about 45 minutes.  in my experience as a ufologist, a person of experience in this phenomena and a person with the experience of 20 plus years i have never seen so many sightings at one time in such a short period of time.  all of the objects traveled in a northern direction and then shot straight up and disappeared.
content.summary: Multiple sightings at terri's

content.detailedDescription: Look there is life on mars here is the proof  daingo vally mars i'll be waiting for u
content.summary: Ufo on mars

content.detailedDescription: I have recently moved to the south west corner of the kansas city metro area. we are now far enough outside most of the city lights therefore the sky is very bright at night and often catches my eyes. i had just returned home from a work trip and was taking the trash to the curb. walking towards the end of the driveway i was looking up at the western sky. an object with two rows of lights which were blinking every one second, white to red was moving from east to west rather fast. at first i thought the object was a remote control aircraft or possibly a drone. but it was making manuvers that seemed to test our technology. the craft was jump great distance too fast. then, once it was about a mile away, it stopped and hovered about 500 feet from the ground. the lights were still blinking and i was convinced what i was looking at was something special. all i can truly rule out is it was not an airplane seen normally over head. i also couldn't imagine a remote control could reach the distances this object was covering. i will admit i've never seen a drone in person so it's my best guess. anyways, i was able to get a good picture for being so dark out. i made sure to use my neighbors roofline in the pic to better judge the height and the lights look like a bar. the roofline shows clarity so the camera was not moving. i was also able to take a video! very hard to see but you can see the object is hovering and then descending slow in a controlled speed. i could not hear any noise in the background. once the object descended below my visible sight, i then saw a smaller plane coming from the west heading east and banking around the same distance the object would had been.
content.summary: Flew west, hovered for a bit, lights altered white to red, no sound, bars of light on object

content.detailedDescription: I had let my dog out into the yard. it did not return for awhile so i went outside to check on her. as i was between the house and the garage i looked towards the street (northward) to see it she was there. it was a very clear sky with only some light clouds, i noticed a bright white object, which i initially thought was an airplane. the object was traveling (southward) about the speed of a airplane, but i could not see any wings on the object. i went on looking for my dog, which i found about 10 seconds later. i returned back to my original location to look at the object again, but still could not see any wings. the object then went over the clouds, but was still visible thru them, it also appeared to be slowing down. as it cleared the clouds, it stopped directly above me. i could not see any details of the object, which appeared to be just a bright light. i run into my house to get a my binoculars. i returned and tried to locate the object and focus on it, but had some difficulty. finally, i was able to focus on the light as i looked at the light, i noticed a circular object above it. the circular object was barely visible because of the blue of the sky, and the extreme height. i saw the object for about 20 seconds, but lowered the my binoculars to look at it again with my eyes, i could not see the circular object with my naked eyes. i again tried to see it with my binoculars, but had difficulty locating it. the object then appeared to ascend to where i could barely see the white light emitting with the body of the object, and finally disappeared. the object had multiple rings around it, suggesting different levels or contours. it was huge, and had to be over 50,000 feet high. with my binoculars i can see details of an airplane, which cruise at 35,000 feet. this object was fading into the blue of the sky.
content.summary: Observed white object traveling southward, assume it was a airplane, object slowed and hovered above me, used binocular to see a circluar object . it was huge.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in the bleachers watching a tractor pull (noisy event) when i observed two pairs of orangish lights traveling slowly across the sky at a rate of a slow small aircraft or helicopter. the first pair turned to the sw, then another pair appeared from the east, then another, each pair turning to the sw following the same path. there were a total of 16 lights. the objects disappeared below the treeline to the south of the grandstands.  i thought someone was flying small rc drones as part of the town fair. that was for the first 4. then the next 4 came and i thought they might be helicopters doing something for aberdeen proving ground (about 45 min drive sw of us)...Which may well be the case, but no information has yet surfaced.
content.summary: Lights traveled in pairs, moving e and turning to sw, moving rather slowly

content.detailedDescription: Sept 17 2014 at approximately 10:30 was walking from car to the house in very dark area looked to northwest sky noticed stars nothing unusual.After looking down and then looking up i again looked at same spot in sky and observed {what i thought was} a very bright star that was not there before below three other stars i had observed before.I kept eyes on it and noticed it was getting even brighter and larger also shining emanating rays of radiance and extreme brightness not like aircraft landing lights more like a welders torch.This occurred over 6-7 seconds where after it started to fade and grow progressively less bright to the size of a regular bright star{or same as a satellite moving across the sky}.From stationary it proceeded to move across the sky{it was very high the whole time i believe as well]and it moved from nw towards the north away from me gradually getting dimmer [as a satellite would if you were observing its orbiting the earth]what was remarkable was as i watched its path as it travelled away from me towards the horizon on its path it jumped at right angles from its path up first the forward then down then up again forward and down which was somewhat startling to see.After about one minute and some seconds later i watched the starlike object proceed on its path into the darkness seeing it dimly fade away
content.summary: Observed in clear area sky a bright starlike object grow extreme bright then fade started to move nw to n  jumped up down and back abrupt angled change direction as it move away on path and faded into blackness of sky

content.detailedDescription:
my husband and i were watching tv about 8;30 pm when i heard a helicopter flying over. i saw it was flying north. (we live in a rural area with corn and bean fields surrounding our home). within minutes we heard a loud thundering sound, like several jets.It got so loud i went to the back deck to look up. suddenly there was a huge flash of light in the north about 1/4 mile away. my husband thought a jet blew up. then there were many flashes of light but they were stationary and lasted only seconds. the the loud rumbling faded away. we went back inside. again we heard the sound of jets approaching from the south. we both jumped up and went to the front porch and yard. the noise was very loud. almost overhead a bright light flashed, egg shaped likr, then disappeared to reappear a short distance away then there were several. our son and family live mile west, we called them and they saw them too. this display continued on and off for about another 40 min.
we called the airbase to see if they were doing war games in our area. no, they said never in this area. our neighbor to the north also heard the sounds but never went outside. we were told by the air base there were no 
jet in our area during this time period. we really thought it was just war-games but the air base denied any traffic in the area..
content.summary: Many huge light flashes above farm fields

content.detailedDescription: On tuesday, september 16 around 8 pm, i was out admiring the clear afternoon. my attention was drawn to two large airliners overflying the area in very close formation, wing tip to wing tip. the aircraft were not very high and what was most interesting, no noise could be heard. i called on my neighbors and they also witnessed the event as the aircraft appeared to be gliding by and moving unusually slow. i would say the entire event took about 4 minutes before the aircraft disappeared from view heading north east into kentucky. the flight path was from south west to north east in a straight line. the aircraft were reflecting the sun light and were not leaving a contrail from the engines. i would describe the aircraft as large passenger type. passenger windows could be seen on the side. both aircraft were identical with two engines under the wings. as they faded in the distance the aircraft on the right began emitting smoke from the engines and began to climb leaving the left aircraft behind.
content.summary: Large aircraft flying in tight formation.

content.detailedDescription: I was behind my mom's house at the stated address. i was trying to get a clear picture of the full moon, as the night was clear. i was using a new apple ipad so i was trying to set it to get the best results. i looked in the sky and noticed the object below to the right of the moon just sitting there. i would say it was too far away to get any detail, but then again it was also definitely out of place. it didn't move for about 15 minutes, there was no smoke visible nor a vapor trail leading to it's stationary position. the next and only thing it did was turn round for maybe a minute and then disappeared. once again leaving no trail, vapor or smoke. i took 2 or 3 pics that i am sending. nothing spectacular as far as visuals. but i am 40 years old, i don't consider myself a genius, but by no means an idiot. i sent this because thinking about this i thought 1)it wasn't a plane or anything that flies by conventional means becuz it was just sat there. 2)considering the moon and the objects proximity to it, whatever it was it was enormous.3) doing a little research i discovered there is no way it was satellite, star, or planet. which is why i sent these to you. i am not some nutty conspiracy theorist, but i am a realist. that being said, it would be foolish to discount the number of sightings by people with a lot more credentials. if you read this and thank u 4 your time.
content.summary: Trying to take a picture of the full moon with a new apple ipad. noticed ufo

content.detailedDescription:
While my wife and i were driving north on freeway 15 on april 10, 2814,
san diego county calif. around 9 p.M., i spotted a very bright light ahead
of us. it was quite a distance ahead at 45 degrees. the light appeared to pulsate as we got closer. as we passed the bright light, my wife took a picture.

i didn't look at the picture until a couple days later. to my surprise
instead of seeing a bright light, 2 rectangular objects appeared in the
picture glowing very bright and emitting what to be exhaust with a puff
ball at the end. the rectangular objects appeared to be areo-dynamic as
they sat side by side. i shared the photo with my daughter, who asked, what 

are those string of lights above the objects? directly above the 2 objects
are what appears to be 3 objects with 7 lights in an arc. they appear to
be monitoring or flying over the 2 objects at a great distance above.

the night was very clear and dark along a rural section of the freeway.
you will have to scroll down on the picture to observe the sting of lights
which appear to be flying saucers. 

will send separate e-mail attachment that will allow you to expand the
objects. directly above the objects you will notice 3 objects appearing
as 7 lights separately, 1 fainter than the other 2, which appear to be
flying saucers.

please send us an e-mail confirming the receipt of photo attachment.

thank you, irungu
content.summary: Observed a bright light  while driving along freeway i15 north in san diego county. had wife to take a picture.

content.detailedDescription:
I went outside on to my front porch to smoke around 8:15 p.M.  i saw the low bright star and thought it was an airplane at first taking off from denver international airport.  however, it glowed like a star but did not move as an airplane would have. 

the star-like object hung in the air and i could see it through the distant treeline of black forest.  when it did not move, i thought it was probably venus and decided to come inside and check the visible constellations on my computer.

around 10:05 p.M. i went outside to smoke again.  i was watching the same star-like object and had begun wondering by this time if it were a ufo.  it seemed too close to be venus.

while i was watching it, suddenly it disappeared, as it sucked into the darkness.  i stood there watching the area, looking for it to see if it reappeared anywhere else, but it did not.

i was convinced then that it was a ufo.
content.summary: Lighted object looked like a large star and hung in one place for over 2 hours; then appeared to be absorbed in darkness.

content.detailedDescription: I was on duty as a private officer working the night shift in midtown kansas city, mo. i was in my crown vic. it was just before midnight. an orange light got my attention out of my left peripheral vision. i looked to my left which would be due south of my position. i was surprised to see an orange fireball the size of an aspirin at arms length. it was moving at the speed and altitude of a satellite descending to the southwest. i grabbed my camcorder and began filming. it looked like a campfire in the sky. it was obviously flaming but leaving no trail or debris. my camcorder began going in and out of focus. i began to lose sight of the fireball as it went behind telephone polls and buildings. i got out of the crown vic to attempt another shoot, but it was no good. it was gone. the whole thing happened in probably just under two minutes. initially, when the fireball was due left of me at approximately 9 o'clock (i.E. 45 degrees), i was struggling to remove my camcorder from my backpack and the zipper got caught in the threading. by the time i got it out the fireball had traversed considerably further to the southwest. in the short time that i filmed it, as the camcorder came in and out of focus, i managed to obtain two distinct focal points. when i got off work, i transferred the film to dvd. i was able to zoom (i.E. magnify) the images to the 4th power. what i was hoping to see is what i refer to as a "light signature." a pronouncement indicative of an energy source. i was not let down. what is evident in all of the images, both focused and unfocused, is something white-hot at the center of what appears to be a flaming ball of orange plasma. it is evident that the orange plasma is secondary to the white-hot intensity of what lies at the heart, or the center of the anomaly. ever-so-often the object or objects at the center, because in many cases i was able to count as many as four would suddenly emit a searingly white-hot burst of light that would flood the whole chamber of the surrounding plasma, and immediately return to an orange fireball with a white-hot center. at this point i am just filled with amazement.  no answers. sounds did not sync up with video for some reason, so we opted to mute the video.
content.summary: Orange fireball over kansas city 08/07/14

content.detailedDescription:
I was combing through a large set of photographs and noticed something unusual in a few of the shots of navy pier, chicago.  
out over the water in the first few you can see some blur, which is what i accounted the strange shape to.  
upon closer inspection the first two photos do have some hand movement blur.  but, the third photo does not and the fourth where you can see that the object is gone is also steady.

i've had suggestions that it's a satellite.  i don't believe that is what i am looking at here.

shot a is the first of the series as he was coming up close to the pier.
shots b through d were all taken at 3:31 according to the camera data, but i believe it was set for another time zone from looking at the light as it rises.  i have a handful more from beyond d, but didn't see anything of note.

the gentleman who took these photographs didn't notice anything in the sky as his eye was trained on his viewfinder.  he was never aware of any presence or movement and was just capturing the sunrise.

i have full permission to post these photos, as the photographer currently wishes to remain anonymous.
content.summary: Photos a friend took.  didn't know there was anything there.

content.detailedDescription: It was april 12 2014 around 8:40 p.M. i went to pay my sister some money i owed her, we were in her front yard talking when out of the corner of my eye on the ne direction, i seen what seemed like a greenish cloud moving but then i said to myself no, then i looked again, asked my sister is that a green cloud moving or am i seeing things, she looked and said its probably falling/shooting stars, then we seen some pause in mid air for about 3-4 seconds and continue hovering in a se direction. she was confused and asked if falling/shooting stars can do that. i told her those ain't stars, that's something else. we observed them for about 5-10 minutes before they just disappeared into the night sky 1 by 1, they all seemed to be traveling in like triangular formation whether it was 3 or 4 or 5 in a group, they all kept a triangular formation. after they disappeared i went to my girlfriends house, told her what i observed and i got back in my car, drove out to the mountain area to see if i can see or observe more, stayed out for about 2 hours but nothing showed up after that.
content.summary: Between 15 - 30 green lights all hovering from a ne direstion & disappearing as they travelled to a se direction by bear mountain

content.detailedDescription:
(original narration) sighting of a ufo at 9:45pm central canada timezone (cet) and it was a clear sky night, very low light pollution. seen for aprox. five seconds. description, white glowing lights and moving north. when i noticed it there, it dimmed the lights and went incognito (disappeared).

follow-up narration approximately 4 hours later.
1. i was walking along a back-road with my backpack and flashlights. 
2. it was glowing in the sky and was moving steadily north.
3. i could identify it as a probe.
4. it had white lights and looked brighter than a star. size was a bit larger and was not too far in the sky.  when i turned my head in the direction of the probe. which i can say, i was walking southward at the time. it was moving northward. i turned my head left and looked up aprox. 50 degrees there it was. 
as for the motions, it's speed was not too fast. i'd say the speed of an aircraft you'd see from planes.
4. i'd say i was fairly happy too. i don't understand why but my reaction was to say a few words. "hi there my name is ************. thanks for visiting" 
5. it was gone before i could finish my sentence. it simply faded into darkness.
content.summary: Clear sky night, very low light pollution. when i noticed it there, it dimmed the lights and went incognito (disappeared)

content.detailedDescription: When i was walking my dog, i looked up, and i saw a a star like thing shooting across the sky. it was bigger and brighter than a star. it didn't look like an asteroid or anything. it was the first time ive ever seen something like that... i went online and it turned out more people saw the same thing. a white circular object flying across the sky at a high speed.
content.summary: Bright light, way too fast for a plane and a lot bigger than a star
